mapper.select: select * from eb_community where c_name like '%'||#{c_name}||'%'
select * from eb_community_post, eb_community where cp_community = c_no and c_no=#{c_no} order by cp_date desc
select * from eb_community_post where cp_owner = #{cp_owner} order by cp_date desc

select * from eb_community_post, eb_community_reply where cp_no = cr_cp_no and cr_owner = #{cr_owner} and cr_date = ( select max(cr_date) from eb_community_reply where cr_owner = #{cr_owner} and cp_no = cr_cp_no ) order by cp_date desc

select * from eb_community_reply, eb_community_post, eb_community where cp_no= cr_cp_no and c_no = cp_community and cp_owner = #{u_id} and not cr_owner = #{u_id} and cr_like = 0 and cr_date between current_date -30 and current_date order by cr_date desc

select count(*) from eb_community_reply, eb_community_post, eb_community where cp_no= cr_cp_no and c_no = cp_community and cp_owner = #{u_id} and not cr_owner = #{u_id} and cr_like = 0 and cr_date between current_date -30 and current_date order by cr_date desc
select * from eb_community_post where (cp_title like '%'||#{cp_seach}||'%' or cp_contents like '%'||#{cp_seach}||'%') and cp_community = #{c_no} order by cp_date desc
select * from eb_community_reply, eb_community_post where cr_cp_no = cp_no and cp_no=#{cp_no} order by cr_date asc
select count(*) from eb_community_reply where cr_cp_no = #{cp_no}
select c_name, c_no, lr_type from eb_community, eb_like_record where lr_where_no = c_no and lr_type = 1 and lr_owner = #{u_id}
select * from eb_community_post, eb_user where cp_owner = u_id and cp_no = #{cp_no}
mapper.update: update eb_community_reply set cr_like = 1 where cr_no = #{cr_no}
update eb_like_record set lr_type = 0 where lr_where_no = #{lr_where_no}
update eb_like_record set lr_type = 1 where lr_where_no = #{lr_where_no}
update eb_community_post set cp_title = #{cp_title} , cp_contents = #{cp_contents} where cp_no = #{cp_no}
